title: Cauliflower and Broccoli with Gorgonzola
ingredients: ['300g cauliflower, divided into florets', '250g broccoli, divided into florets', '40g unsalted butter', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '21/2 tbsp plain flour', '300ml semi-skimmed milk', '150g Gorgonzola piccante cheese, roughly chopped or crumbled', '2 tomatoes, sliced']
